classreader
Class ClassFileCollection

java.lang.Object
  classreader.ClassFileCollection
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassFileJarCollection, EagerClassFileJar, LazyClassFileJar
public abstract class ClassFileCollection
extends Object

A ClassFileCollection is an arbitrary collection of classes.

Author:
Werner Hahn

Constructor Detail

ClassFileCollection

public ClassFileCollection()
Method Detail

getClassFile

public abstract ClassFile getClassFile(String className)
Returns the ClassFile with the given name. The name of a class is its fully qualified name, so for example the class name of the class Foo in the package bar.baz is bar.baz.Foo.

Parameters:
className - the name of the class
Returns:
the created ClassFile or null if no class with the given name exists

getClassNames

public Collection<String> getClassNames()
Returns a List of class names this ClassFileCollection has to offer (optional operation).

Returns:
the List of class names
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - if this ClassFileCollection maintains no such information

getClassFileCollection

public static ClassFileCollection getClassFileCollection(File jar)
Creates a lazy ClassFileCollection from the given JAR File. Same as getClassFileCollection(jar, ClassFileJarMode.LAZY).

Parameters:
jar - the File to load
Returns:
the ClassFileCollection with lazy access to the classes contained in the given JAR {code File}
See Also:
getClassFileCollection(File, ClassFileJarMode)

getClassFileCollection

public static ClassFileCollection getClassFileCollection(File jar,
                                                         ClassFileJarMode mode)
Creates a ClassFileCollection from the given JAR File with the specified mode.

Parameters:
jar - the File to load
mode - the mode with which to load the JAR File
Returns:
the ClassFileCollection with access to the classes contained in the given JAR {code File}

getClassFileJarCollection

public static ClassFileCollection getClassFileJarCollection(File... jars)
Creates a ClassFileCollection from multiple JAR Files. Same as getClassFileCollection(ClassFileJarMode.LAZY, jars).

Parameters:
jars - jars the Files to load
Returns:
the ClassFileCollection with lazy access to the classes contained in the given JAR {code File}s
See Also:
getClassFileJarCollection(ClassFileJarMode, File...)

getClassFileJarCollection

public static ClassFileCollection getClassFileJarCollection(ClassFileJarMode mode,
                                                            File... jars)
Creates a ClassFileCollection from multiple JAR Files. The Files are searched in the order given.

Parameters:
mode - the mode of the ClassFileCollections contained in this collection
jars - the Files to load
Returns:
the ClassFileCollection with access to the classes contained in the given JAR {code File}s
